title: Cover
description: Ovoid shape. Curved spout and loop handle. Clear crackle glaze on buff body. Deep blue enamel in form of six petal-like sections on shoulder, outlined and decorated with "jui-i" forms of gold, green, blue, red. Gold lines on underside of spout and handle. Underside of foot glazed. Stopperlike cover with similar "jui-i" design on gold reserve. Round knob.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover.
earthenware. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1949-151-17-a,b.
